name: smart-did-video-service
description: Smart DID Video Service for Asan Dream Spring Children & Youth Library

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.dev:worker: npm run build --workspace=@smart-did/shared && npm run dev --workspace=@smart-did/worker
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/backend/node_modules packages/frontend/node_modules packages/worker/node_modules packages/shared/node_modules
